mksourcedir

chezmoi managed
cmpenv stdout golden/managed

[short] stop

chezmoi managed --include=all
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-all

chezmoi managed --include=absent
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-absent

chezmoi managed --include=dirs
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-dirs

chezmoi managed --include=files
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-files

chezmoi managed --include=symlinks
cmpenv stdout golden/managed-symlinks

-- golden/managed --
$HOMESLASH/.bashrc
$HOMESLASH/.binary
$HOMESLASH/.exists
$HOMESLASH/.gitconfig
$HOMESLASH/.hushlogin
$HOMESLASH/.ssh
$HOMESLASH/.ssh/config
$HOMESLASH/.symlink
-- golden/managed-all --
$HOMESLASH/.absent
$HOMESLASH/.bashrc
$HOMESLASH/.binary
$HOMESLASH/.exists
$HOMESLASH/.gitconfig
$HOMESLASH/.hushlogin
$HOMESLASH/.ssh
$HOMESLASH/.ssh/config
$HOMESLASH/.symlink
-- golden/managed-absent --
$HOMESLASH/.absent
-- golden/managed-dirs --
$HOMESLASH/.ssh
-- golden/managed-files --
$HOMESLASH/.bashrc
$HOMESLASH/.binary
$HOMESLASH/.exists
$HOMESLASH/.gitconfig
$HOMESLASH/.hushlogin
$HOMESLASH/.ssh/config
-- golden/managed-symlinks --
$HOMESLASH/.symlink
